content: knitted jumper for men in drops alaska the piece is worked top down with double neck and saddle shoulders sizes s - xxxl drops design pattern no x-456 yarn group c or a + a **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl 37¾ -41 -44 -48 -52 -57⅜ **materials** drops alaska from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 700-750-800-900-1000-1100 g colour 45 light olive **knitting gauge** 17 stitches in width and 22 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm needles drops double pointed needles size 5 mm drops circular needle size 5 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm for stocking stitch drops double pointed needles size 4 mm drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm for rib
